title: Opening *.msg file without downloading it.
content:
Hi. I'm having trouble finding a way to associate *.msg files with the default Outlook application. In earlier versions of Firefox, when opening a msg file, it automatically opened the Outlook application to view the file. Currently, I have to download the file and from the downloaded files open it. I can't find an option to associate msg files to open automatically in the Outlook application.

I can do that with pdf or doc/docx files but I can't do it with msg files. With these files there is no option "Always open with XXX application" like with pdf doc.

Is there any option to add this ?
creator: lukasz.solon

title: Bookmarks Toolbar DISAPPEARED (Empty) v116.0.2 (64-bit); Win 10 Pro: v22H2 (OS Build 19045.3208)
content:
This happened after I used "Manage Bookmarks" to "Restore" a previous session

After I noticed that the Toolbar Menu was gone, I tried "Restore" from and EARLIER session, to see if that would bring it back. It didn't

I also tried "Import Bookmarks" (from previously "Exported" HTML) Still no Toolbar Menu.

This is the SECOND problem I've had (in almost-20 years of using Firefox) after installing a new version: this time, 116.0.2

My Toolbar Menu contained years of folders and bookmarks; any of which I don' still have the information to replace them with -- or the Ease-of-Use that menu provided!

DickB36
creator: DickB19

title: Řízení volby tiskáren
content:
Lze nějak nastavit, navolit defaultní tisk podle požadavku uživatele ? Příklad. 2 tiskárny, jedna A4 na faktury a jedna A6 na štítky. Potřebuji při otevření webu a stažení PDF s fakturou A4 přinutit firefox aby tisknul na A4 tiskárnu, nebo aby ji vybral jako preferovanou vytisknul to na ní. Pokud stáhnu PDF se štítkem tak aby to poslal na A6 tiskárnu.

Díky za pomoc
creator: magdalek

title: Restoring Closed Tabs
content: Firefox unexpectedly closed on me and when I opened it up again it did not immediately give me the option to restore closed tabs. So I went to the menu to click on restore closed tabs there but the option was not provided to click on. How do I restore tabs under this scenario? Thanks.
creator: scaddell23

title: Firefox 116.0.2 is not remembering my last save destination / folder
content:
Since last few days, whenever i want to save a file from Gmail, it is taking me to that one folder (destination) which i had used few days ago, probably before the latest update.

I navigate and go to the folder i want to save the file in and then finish the download.

But unlike before, the next document which i am trying to download, opens the download box to save in the old folder (not even the default "downloads" folder) instead of the folder in which i have saved the file moments ago.

I have checked the settings and everything is okay there.

This has severely impacted my working and is causing immense inconvenience.

Is this a bug? Do i need to reset my firefox? Please help!
creator: prabhuamey84

title: Firefox disappeared after Windows 10 update
content:
After the last Windows 10 Update Firefox seems gone from my PC.

In Program Files (x86) I still have:

Mozilla FirefoxOld Mozilla Firefox.bak Mozilla Firefox.bak.delete

There is also a desktop folder Old Firefox Data

How can I get back my old bookmarks and passwords? And how can this happen?
creator: yello1

title: firefox
content: The dot which goes back and forth on a tab while a page is loading stopped working. A page will still load but I have no idea when. I uninstalled firefox and reinstalled it that didn't work.I tried the troubleshoot mode nothing there helped.....I downloaded the latest update.....still no help....I've never seen this before and I've been using firefox since it's beginning. There's only a hourglass shaped icon in the tab now.
creator: flatwound56

title: Unable to sign in
content:
I am getting this message when attempting to log in.


An error occurred during a connection to tv.onesearch.org. Peer’s Certificate has been revoked.

Error code: SEC_ERROR_REVOKED_CERTIFICATE
